website_summaries.verdict: A highly versatile inversion table that is designed to deliver relief from back pain in a variety of ways.
pros: This model is one of the easier inversion tables to assemble
It features a number of adjustable and removable nodes that can be position at trigger points to release muscle tension
This inversion table can lock in a fully inverted position and comes with a free app to teach you how to train
cons: The spring-loaded ankle lock can be a little difficult to operate for people with a limited range of motion

customer_reviews.title: Back Relief at last!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a herniated L3 and L4 discs. I've been in different levels of pain for the last 20 years. I've had the shots in my back that give some relief. Finally I tried this inversion table. I started slow and at a small angle for 30 seconds. I could feel the pressure releasing off my lower back. I worked up to basically upside down for 4 minutes every other day and my back has no more pain. This is a great well built Table that is nice and sturdy. Easy assembly and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: Does not do as promised!  Broke my toe!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work as described. It’s not made for short people, and does not have enough resistance settings! I literally flipped upside down and had to slide out on my head and flip my feet over behind me. Broke my toe when it got caught on the bar. This was a total disappointment! Back is no better than before!
customer_reviews.author: Hreeves2016

customer_reviews.title: Meh... so far
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is sub-par for what I paid for it. I noticed that the metal support piece near the head section is crooked and bent out of sorts. This would allow my head to tip to the side slightly as the plastic support would be allowed to bend that way. The foam ankle pieces are hard and uncomfortable. I have purchased sponges as suggested by another reviewer on here and it has improved the situation but it still leaves something to be desired. I have been using this daily and have not noticed much results yet.
customer_reviews.author: NotAChance

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.  It works great, super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been needing for my hip and knee. For years, I've had problems with discs out of alignment, lower back and this year my knee acted up (yay!). I have a hanging bar and sometimes that would make my hip go back in place, but didn't help the knee. I got the Teeter, set it up easily and the first time I hung on it, everything popped back into place. For the first time in months, my feet have been warm! Who knew that having your hip and spine out of alignment would make your feet cold! Wow. Just wow. Buy one, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, no downside
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what I want. To be fair, I've never tried other inversion tables, so I don't know whether or not you can get the same quality/comfort from something cheaper. Assembly was pretty easy, and I think some other models have more complicated assembly--if that's important to you. The table itself has no padding; some do, but if you do complete inversion that doesn't matter. It feels sturdy and heavy, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: john p lushefski

customer_reviews.title: It's difficult to put together if you're like me - absolutely no mechanical skills at all - ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works!! I've had lower back pain for years, and 2 minites several times a day has really helped. It's difficult to put together if you're like me - absolutely no mechanical skills at all - but it was easy for my husband. It's not necessary to go completely upside down, nor even recommended. I put it on level 1, where it only barely goes back, and that was enough for me. It stretches out your back, your stomach and rib muscles gently. I personally think it's very therapeutic. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a measure of relief from chronic back pain
customer_reviews.text: This table was purchased for my husband. He's had several low back surgeries and currently has stenosis of the spine. Very Very painful. He's uses the table about twice a day for a month and half and has received a measure of relief. You can actually hear his back "pop" when he inverts. I believe over time he will get better and better results. I would encourage anyone with back pain (especially serious back pain) to give this a try. We are very happy we purchased this Inversion Table. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: purp

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my husbands sciatica pain. He was ...
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of my husbands sciatica pain. He was waling with a cane already by the time he discovered this. The chiropractor was getting ready to pump with a steroid and possible surgery. Within a month and a half at 5 min per day of using this miracle product he was back to his hard work and normal heavy duty cowboy activity.
customer_reviews.author: Girl

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item for my father for Father's day and he loves it! I haven't tried it as he lives in a different state but based off of his recommendation I'll be purchasing one for myself. He says he uses it daily and it helped his back out a lot! He always says it made him taller but I'm a bit skeptical with that one lol.
customer_reviews.author: waynegfrazierjr

customer_reviews.title: Check for product defect especially frame
customer_reviews.text: This product came to me as a defective one.please review my pictures and the iron has bent. Not too sure off it now and I am returning to Amazon now
customer_reviews.author: Kalyan Sandeep Tirumala

customer_reviews.title: buy a cheaper competitor's verstion.
customer_reviews.text: 5 star rating is because of how well it works. It's all about gravity, so no manufacturer can say theirs 'works' better than anyone else's. I discovered numerous lower priced competitors after the I bought it, put it together, and used it many times. I got it on black Friday so it was half off. it's built like a tank, very heavy duty, but I don't need it to be so strong. If this was in a community room with a lot of people using it, then it would need to be this strong. but for only one or two people using it, you can go much cheaper. but, let me tell you, my back feels soooo much better.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: Not the Usual As Seen on TV Item
customer_reviews.text: #1. FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS! WATCH THE VIDEO BEFORE USING! #2 SEE #1. Sturdy, high quality construction, easy to assemble. This is a serious piece of equipment and must be used as directed. It is larger than expected. Will be hard to store in a small condo. After only 3 days of use I am feeling a difference in my back. I have incorporated an inversion time into my mornings and evenings. STOKED!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tauchas

customer_reviews.title: medical grade inversion table
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious inversion table. It costs a bit more than most, but it is the only one I've seen that has the foot adjustment to adjust where the ankle locks squeeze down on - this prevents you from sliding when inverting if you lock lower on your ankle closer to your feet. Overall, a bit pricey, but built to last and high quality. It has also relieved sciatica pain that other people were telling me I'd need surgery for. That alone was worth the cost. I think these are great for back health. I lift heavy weights and like to use this after days where the lifting compresses my back (squats, overhead press, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Digby Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, sturdy, safe...
customer_reviews.text: I Love it = I should have gotten one ten yrs ago after crunching my spine in a 12ft fall ! = This inversion table, along with spine strengthening exercises, gets my posture more aligned and relieves much pain from osteophytosis, pinched nerves and general neuropathy... Arrived quickly, great quality and safe. Easily put together (with important warnings in the manual that need to stay with the machine). I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: cecile Poletti

customer_reviews.title: Good for back pain
customer_reviews.text: I've had back pain for probably 30 years. You name it I've tried it. This consistently works the best for me. Do you follow the instructions and have someone with you the 1st time . It's disconcerting the 1st time you use it. But after that 1st time I use it by myself easily. Sometimes after you Stretch it feels a little harder to pull the knob forward to release your feet.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than I could have imagined!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skepticl about how much this would help my chromic upper back problems. After getting it and setting it up(15 minutes and super easy), begain using it for two minutes twice a day. I got immediate relief. Now do 3 1/2 minutes twice a day. My dad also has back trouble and after using it two days ceased to have back pain. We both had to go to the hospital a few tines a year and used accupunture to treat our back. Never had much or any back pains again. Fantastic in our experience with upper back problems. A fantastic purchase. Very well made and havy duty!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: lower back pain no more
customer_reviews.text: I bought the teeter just before I went to nyc for a month. my back pain was driving me crazy. I got the teeter just in time to use it for a week before I had to leave. It loosed up my lower back muscles and spine to where I felt I could sit comfortably in the plane. I have recently returned and intend to use the equipment on a daily basis. My back has become about 90 percent better and I intend to strengthen it with my teeter.
customer_reviews.author: ranger one

customer_reviews.title: Just as Good as Taking Pain Medicine
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing this teeter chair is the best thing I have done. I commute over 70 miles each way 3-5 times a week. My lower back by the end of my commute feels strained, stiff and hurts very much. I have been using my teeter for over a month now. My back pain is usually relieved without taking any pain medicine and just inverting in my teeter chair for 2 minutes or more twice each day.
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: Instant back relief
customer_reviews.text: I have a back injury that I'm doing physical therapy for, and this provides relief and helps stretch out the muscles that are tense. I love that it goes full 180 degrees so I can fully stretch out my spine as well as do exercises such as crunches and up-side-down squats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate results
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommended the Teeter for back pain relief. After several weeks of shopping around I decided on this product. My husband and son assembled it very easily as they were talking excitedly about using it. They both say they felt a positive difference immediately after using it for a few minutes. It is now part of their daily routine. I use it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it1
customer_reviews.text: Saved my back. I do not have a ruptured disc. Wasn't effective for a friend with severe back injury. y discs seem to collapse form sitting, and this stretches them out and aligns my spine beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Make you feel like "Batman"
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could be better for the back support unit, but all and all it a very good product. I'm a fairly tall guy at 6.4" (1.94cm) and just under 240lb (110kg) and you feel totally safe hanging like a bat upside down. My length and weight (aka belly) has not been kind to lower back but the Chiropractor recommended this one and thought I'll give it a go when it came on special Works like a charm although to take some pressure off your back. Instructions are excellent easy to assemble. It is not light though, so take care moving it if you do have back issue.
customer_reviews.author: Casper Pieterse

customer_reviews.title: Buy some bolts and an allen wrench
customer_reviews.text: The item shipped without the bolts and tool required for assembly. No instruction manual or video accompanied the order. Guess I'll need to order the bolts and buy an allen wrench @ a local hardware store and search you-tube for the assembly video?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pain Relief for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have an inversion table, but have always wanted one I could do on my own. I didn't want it to leave me hanging and not be able to get back up. This one arrived very quickly, easy to put together and works magnificently. I use it multiple times per day and get immediately relief. I selected this one because it is FDA approved. Only downside, I thought I had selected the one where you have a handle to open and close the foot/ankle restraints, this one does not have that. You have to manually pull pin to open the restraints.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie O

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously an investment worth its weight in gold. It was crucial in my recovery from a serious back injury and has been great as a recovery tool for myself and my athletes. I use it in the morning and after workouts to help add to my stretching routine.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my own, only took me around 20 minutes. It's a bit tricky trying to move back into starting position sometimes though.
customer_reviews.author: Banarax

customer_reviews.title: Great invention...it really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing...It relieved the pressure on my sciatic nerve and I am doing a lot better....I love it and use it several times a day...I have a lot of pain free days thanks to this table...I would recommend it to everyone with sciatic nerve problems...it worked for me😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D

customer_reviews.title: Do not compromise, by a teeter.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re not familiar with inversion tables, this is the brand you wanna buy. Save up a little bit extra and get this one. Don’t compromise. I’ve been using teeter since 2001. The reason for the three stars is it took three weeks for delivery and the box was beat to heck. Couple of pieces had scratches on them but wasn’t worth having it replace. I’m sure Mr. teeter wouldn’t be happy with his product being delivered this way.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Really helps relieve my pain.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this I was sort of overwhelmed with the thought of putting it together, but it came with a link to an app that walked me through it and I had it together and was using it after 15 minutes. I like that the angle of incline is adjustable so I don't have to always go totally inverted all the time. The instructions were clear and understandable on how to use it for the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Darell

customer_reviews.title: Love my Teeter!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was totally skeptical, but a friend of my raved about his Teeter. I got mine and it was easy to set up and very well made. I was a little nervous at first but after the first use, my back felt better. It was kind of amazing. Now I'm really comfortable and use it a couple of times a day. I was worried id get bored with it and wind up not using it, but thats not the case. Well worth the money and I plan on using it forever!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. BAISA

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Equipment
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought one a few years ago and it has kept him out the Chiropracter. He was in a bad accident. So when my son, who is an athlete, started complaining of back, leg and shoulder pain I purchased this for him. Within 2 days no more pain. He uses it 2 times daily for 1 min each time (morning and evening) very pleased and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: tamarra Gillean

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I use this most days and love it! It really does relieve the pain in my neck from a compressed disc, and simply feels great for an overall stretch after my workouts. Relaxing and lengthening. It is important that you use it regularly to have continued benefits! The price matched that of Dick's sporting goods, easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M. Long

customer_reviews.title: Priceless
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Teeter! I use it 3-4 times a day. Be sure to set the leg extension JUST RIGHT to get the balance right - else it becomes difficult to get back up from a vertical position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this inversion table is great but the only thing that is annoying is the ...
customer_reviews.text: this inversion table is great but the only thing that is annoying is the way we secure our feet which difficult and uncomfortable. I think they want you to spend the extra money to buy the optional lever that makes it easy and safe to secure your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and then some
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible. My partner has disc problems and I have a recurring muscle issue in my lower back...the teeter table has been wonderful for us both. We have significantly less pain and more mobility. I would strongly recommend this table to anyone and recommend they look into all information available about teeter tables and the good they can provide. There are options for people with back problems and this is one of them. Look it up, folks. I think you will like what you learn. This teeter table has been worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: plucky

customer_reviews.title: Was not what was expected from their Video...
customer_reviews.text: When I watched the video, it looks like the back of it bends and moves easily as you twist and turn, so as it twist and turns it twists, it turns with you. Wrong when I got my Teeter the back is Hard as a Rock! Maybe instead of $300 I should have paid $600, maybe then it would bend... twist.. and adjust to each of my inversions.... Disappointed, will try to send back and get one that also doesnt hurt my back when trying to free my feet from the grips.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie

customer_reviews.title: It works fantastic! Worth its weight in gold!
customer_reviews.text: I do new construction and remodeling and drive 2 to 4 hours a day. My back has been killing me since the beginning of the year. I have used a teeter before so after weeks of terrible pain I couldn't take it anymore and bought one. After day one my back felt way better. Now 4 days later I'm doing most things I could do before. I love this thing and would recommend it to everyone. Dont overuse it but just a couple short sessions a day is totally worth it. Worth its weight in gold. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy and my wife is small but this works great for both of us. I like to hang fully inverted to stretch and do crunches, no issues and feels secure. I had a cheap (~$100) inversion table years back that sucked so I was hesitant to spend the money but I am glad we did.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cox

customer_reviews.title: Upside down ... boy you’re turnin’ me.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy once I dug out the ol’ DVD player. They tell you to download an app and scan a QR code. But when you scan the code the App (bilt) says it’s not a bilt product. Hmmmmm. Only other thing I wish this came with is an upside down cup holder. Instruction on how to use are useful. And aside from a little ankle discomfort, the maiden voyage was pretty good. Will work my way up to longer sessions and full inversion before I comment on effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collin

customer_reviews.title: Now you know how bats feel...
customer_reviews.text: First the assembly was a breeze. Second it really works! They put all the parts in separate labeled bags so when you look at the instructions all you do is grab that bag. Assembly took maybe 30 minutes and we were already ready to use it. My whole family has used this and we all can see the difference but mostly my grandmother and I who both suffer from sciatica. 3 minutes a day and your back will not hurt anymore! I will keep using this product till they come out with a newer model! I would recommend this to anyone who suffers back issues or never wants to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Apparatus
customer_reviews.text: It is a robustly made, well-designed apparatus. The instructions for assembly are exact and should be followed step-by-step. The Teeter is rather easily put together by one person, although another hand from time to time makes things even easier. I am thoroughly impressed by the detailed instructions for safely using it. It deserves five-stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: second one last one was 20 years old
customer_reviews.text: this is my second inversion table by the same company . I think i liked the older cover materal better. Hard plastic is not my favorite thing. But the older ones matererial was wearing out. I gave it to my daughter. Both me and my husband have had back surguries and they help alot with pain. I highly recomend them fur that. They are very well made the only brand i would ever buy
customer_reviews.author: Earthwoman

customer_reviews.title: Does it work, yes it does.
customer_reviews.text: Watch the video to put the device together also the video explains how to use it otherwise you're not familiar with these devices stuff to assemble and take a few minutes to figure out how to safely use it. Otherwise it's an excellent product I'd recommend it to anybody who wants to maintain a healthy spine. I have saved a ton of money on treatment for my back/spine injury. I am doing so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Roland A.

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I admit it - I was really skeptical, but I was desperate because of the lower torso pain I had been struggling with for the past several months. So, I decided to give the Teeter a try. I am so, so glad I did! Its been less than a week and already I feel a thousand times better. My back and lower torso pain is almost gone, my flexibility is much improved and I all around just feel better - what a fabulous piece of equipment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Hexter

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to use as is
customer_reviews.text: I bought the model EP-560 Teeter. It's a very sturdy and well made piece of equipment. It wasn't cheap compared to other inverter tables I researched. Unfortunately, the design of the Ankle Lock System made it virtually impossible for my wife and I, who are in our 60's, to use without assistance. So, you can imagine my disappointment when I had to spring for another $150 to get the Deluxe Ankle Lock System to make this thing into something usable for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H.

customer_reviews.title: Far Exceeded My Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I expected to feel less pain, not so huddled-over, and maybe even feel like I had better posture - you know, stand straighter, taller. And all of that DID happen. Here's the kicker: for YEARS I've had pain in my right knee. Physical therapy helps, but the pain never goes away. UNTIL I started hanging upside down on the Teeter! I know this is weird, but I guess that kind of stretching of the joint put everything back in place. Two minutes a day in the morning does it for me. Freakin' love this thing!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Was super easy to put together. My ankles are very comfortable in it. It's super easy to adjust; everyone in the family uses it ranging from 4'8' to 6' tall. I printed the exercises online they recommend, still on week 2 and it feels very good on my back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Paul

customer_reviews.title: The other thing is that the ankle supports aren't the most comfortable thing in the world
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed, sturdily constructed, and precisely manufactured (probably not made in China!). My only criticisms would be that, if you have a back problem that makes fiddling with something down by your feet difficult or impossible, you should consider getting the model that has an extended lever so that you don't have to bend over to clamp your ankles. The other thing is that the ankle supports aren't the most comfortable thing in the world. But what do you expect from hanging by your feet. They're actually not that bad if you wear shoes with good padding, like a light hiking shoe. Still, I think I'll end up purchasing the gravity boots that they offer.
customer_reviews.author: john leonard

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sturdy table. The massage attachments that come with it don't do much in that regard. Helps my girlfriend with her back issues.
customer_reviews.author: NRF

customer_reviews.title: GLAD I BOUGHT IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband because he has back pain. He has been using it for a few weeks now and his pain is relieved as soon as he uses it. My 16 year old son loves to go on it as well, after hours of gaming. It was easy to assemble according to my husband. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy with the Teeter hang up
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with the Teeter hang up. Extremely well built, solid product. I’m a 225lbs 6’3” man and this inversion table doesn’t move no matter how I twist or turn. I can't remember the last time my back and joints felt so good. Costumer service is excellent and a pleasure to deal with. The only problem I had it was delivered a week late and I don’t blame Teeter I blame FED EX . Price is higher then another Inversion tables but Remember you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mopar  631

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the weight lift off you
customer_reviews.text: I like this so far. The lumbar board is a must have. You need to use it just from unfolding it and putting it in place lol. But it works good and you can feel the weight lift off you when you start to use it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hout

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has changed my life! I have always had issues with my back, always hurting when I stand still or when I get out of bed. I use this thing 3 or 4 times a week for about ten minutes. I feel like a new man! Honestly setting it up was not bad and the quality of this thing is GREAT! I would have paid 1000000 bucks for this thing if I knew what it was going to do for me! BUY NOW BUY NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Pete B Wenzler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, just a few minutes. very sturdy, once you get used to being upside down for a few minutes its great for lower back pain. just like a traction machine at Chiropractor office
customer_reviews.author: FBGTX

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RELIEF!
customer_reviews.text: The Teeter has helped me a great deal.My back is definetly so much better. I get totally relaxed when I'm inverted. Thank You teeter!
customer_reviews.author: ronald j chiodi

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this equipment for my grandson who has lower back pain at 24. He absolutely loves it. He started feeling the effects within just a few days. It was a great gift for him and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Barnett

customer_reviews.title: But must use everyday that's how good it is on my back pain sciatica pain etc
customer_reviews.text: I can not say how much this thing has helped all my back pain . But must use everyday that's how good it is on my back pain sciatica pain etc. . Thank you TEETER
customer_reviews.author: Jet Boat Cracker

customer_reviews.title: This inversion machine is extremely well built and could not be easier to build.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well built and very easy to build. All you do is install two pieces with six screws that are virtually impossible to get wrong. The machine works great. I got it for sciatica relief but so far I have not noticed any difference. Its only been a few days so I guess time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: inversion table.
customer_reviews.text: This product is near perfect! I bought teeter hang ups dex II and it was not ergonimcally pleasing whatsoever but I knew the benefits of inversion so I bought this. The teeter ep-560 came in some of the best packaging. Everything in the box seperately divided and wrapped with foam. The instructions were clear. Comes with required tools. Build time including unpackaging probably 45min-2hrs depending on indvidual. Comes with dvd. Sturdy product that will last. Fyi requires kind of a large foot.
customer_reviews.author: Spartacus

customer_reviews.title: Deserves 6 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!this thing has saved my life!!No more creams, ice packs, tens machines or heating pads. 2-4 minutes of hanging everyday and I can function like a normal person again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I finally made this purchase after investigating different styles ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I finally made this purchase after investigating different styles in different price ranges from other brands to the full line of teeter hang ups. I was worried that without the easy reach ankle fastening system offered with more expensive models, I would be disappointed, I am not at all because I can very comfortably fasten and unfasten the ankle system and I saved big bucks!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Omalley

customer_reviews.title: great product overall !
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed one from my chiropractor before purchasing. The instructions are wonderful ( a video comes with it), the construction was actually improved from the one I borrowed and I use this everyday to help my back. It is a wonderful product and has helped me greatly!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bente

customer_reviews.title: Wow, back feels great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying this, but now that I've used it for a month I couldn't be happier. I still need to figure out where I want the lumbar support and the acupressure balls, but this makes my back feel great.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: It tends to be very tight and somewhat painful especially in full inversion but not as much in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must if you sit for long periods of time or have neck or back problems. It provides a lot of relief specially to the lower back area and I use it multiple times a day. One thing I wish the company would improve upon is the ankle lock. It tends to be very tight and somewhat painful especially in full inversion but not as much in 60 and lower degrees. Overall the best product in market.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for back injuries or preventive care
customer_reviews.text: I hang upside down in this thing and it really helped my back alot, so much so that I am no longer injured. Still great for stretching out you get used to being upside down pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lindquist-jr

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Quick and Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This Arrived faster than I had thought. My husband and I assembled it very easily with no problems. It's very sturdy, but a little heavy to move. It easier to keep off to the side of a room and pull it out when using. Overall. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and I have already recommended to several friends. The inversion process has eliminated my sciatica pain. The Teeter unit was easy to install and the instruction video was very helpful. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Larry F. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about this purchase and looking forward to seeing the benefits, and am not disappointed. Being in my 50’s and retired military, this has done wonders for back pain. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Stevens

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Very solid feeling machine. Very easy to adjust to height, etc. My fiance and I both use it a few times each week and have just sort of forgotten about our specific back and hip issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful for pain
customer_reviews.text: This inversion table is a little more expensive than others, but it is worth it! It is very sturdy and easy to use. Just a few minutes helps stretch out my back, and relieves pain. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really helped me
customer_reviews.text: This inversion table really helped me with my back. I was having upper back problems due to my career as a hair stylist and I did like the videos and instructions said and I could really tell a difference. I also did other therapies along with it. Now I'm better and I just use it occasionally when my shoulder muscles flare up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Have a herniated lower back disc and suffer from sciatica. Teeter has helped my symptoms greatly in the last month since I got it. I can’t believe how much it helps me. I haven’t visited my chiropractor since I started using the Teeter!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Fischbach

customer_reviews.title: lumbar disc herniation not operable teeter table makes pain significantly ...
customer_reviews.text: lumbar disc herniation not operable teeter table makes pain significantly less and i can walk again with out as much pain
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Hanging Stretching Feeling Better
customer_reviews.text: I have had lower back pain for at least 10 years or more. I use this 4 times a day at least for 5 to 8 min. The key is after hanging on this I use a large size roller to crack my spine. I roll 10 to 20 times and that's it. This is a life changer for me. My lower right stretches right out and when it feels stiff I do the process all over again. I love it!!! Does not take up too much room and it's not cheap looking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Todd

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. It has saved my back
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It has saved my back. Pain clinic wanting to give injections but after using this table my back is better than it has been in many years. I would highly recommend this and have to many of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jodijo

customer_reviews.title: I started feeling great. Have owned for a few months and am ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe it. Seriously. Had been having neck and back discomfort/pain for a few months. Finally caved in and dished out the cash for this. After using this a couple of times I noticed a significant difference. After a couple of weeks, I started feeling great. Have owned for a few months and am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: No joke, i think this things is working
customer_reviews.text: I have had a back pain in lower right side for at least 5 years, every day, all day. I really hope i'm not dreaming, but i don't have it anymore!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, So great for my back!
customer_reviews.text: I was spending a fortune on a chiropractor and this thing has really been amazing! My back gets out of wack, five minutes on the device and I am good as new. Lots of popping noises when I am upside down. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Lover

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging protection.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to setup (maybe 30 minutes). Accessories included. Operates as described (am still getting used to the inversion so I can't blame the machine on that). However the packaging was not sufficient (minus one star) as shown in the photo the backrest was gouged quite deep in one spot and wide in another. For $200+ bucks they could have protected these parts better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Darby

customer_reviews.title: Our chiropractor recommended using an inversion table to relieve his low back ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this teeter after thouroughly comparing the many different ones on the market. Although this one is more expensive, it is certainly built to last and is well worth the price. He uses it several times a day, and it has helped his back pain quite a bit. He has had 2 past back surgeries, one at the neck, and one for his low back. Our chiropractor recommended using an inversion table to relieve his low back stress, and it certainly has done that!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Webb

customer_reviews.title: Understand how to use watch video included
customer_reviews.text: I have used the teeter before purchase and have helped others buy & assemble they have all been satisfied and there health problems have improved. I didn't want to spend that much money, but when you look at the cost of Doctor visit it is well worth the investment.You do need to understand the product and your condition it is not a remedy for all issues, you need to know your body
customer_reviews.author: john johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I ever made.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend wearing hightop shoes while using it and to use the front cushion flat against the top of your foot. But it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Plainview

customer_reviews.title: Super product. Defines a five star machine
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing product, great support services. It gives me immediate relief. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Bend your knees to assist in returning to the upright position.
customer_reviews.text: This inversion table is easy to use! Adjust your height and angle of the table and get relief for your sore back. It is helpful to bend your knees when you want to come back upright. Enjoy the benefits of this inversion table!
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Read comments
customer_reviews.text: Before trying put strap on and do not try alone you will flip back feet will br stuck and cannot get free. You are welcome 3 stars so far easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Jay A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Back traction.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. It is well made. Provides me with temporary back relief. Cheaper than chiropractor traction table visits.
customer_reviews.author: johnny lawson

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years of sciatica problems, I am finally cured. I watched an infomercial on these. I never order stuff I see on infomercials because its usually garbage. I was desperate, though. I ordered one from Amazon the next day. After the first day, I felt relieve. I was cured in 2 days. This was a few months ago. Since then. I haven't had any issues. Teeter shouldn't have infomercials, though. I feel it cheapens the product. This is a very good heavy duty product.
customer_reviews.author: Hyme Dagreat

customer_reviews.title: Great product but poor packing
customer_reviews.text: Really well designed product that works exactly as advertised. Assembly is MUCH easier if you watch the DVD first (I didn't initially!) Due to flimsy packaging both of the plastic cams that lock the pivot bolts in position were smashed in situ (one star docked as a result.) Teeter sent replacements by post at no charge the moment I reported the issue which I guess happens quite often. I was assured that the product could be safely used in the interim - which I did without incident.
customer_reviews.author: AA Flier

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down intlo 3 easily transportable pieces to take with you on extended road ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for me with my neck and back issues. Breaks down intlo 3 easily transportable pieces to take with you on extended road trips. Fits into my Kia Soul. Does wonders for my issues and recommend it very highly!
customer_reviews.author: R.G.E. Tiegs

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!..Really relieves back pains over time.. Consistency is key.
customer_reviews.author: H L

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I am a heavy set
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I am a heavy set, middle age man. I am on my feet all day long working. Not only my back, but my feet, ankles, knees and hips take a beating. The Teeter Hang Up has relieved my chronic lower back and hip tightness after only a few sessions. I have only used the slight inversion but it works great. Go slowly, a few minutes a day. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Bug man

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very well thought of when making for customer. Easy assembly (and I suck at putting things together). Packaging was perfect and guilds you on what to do when you open the box. The actual machine is solid and not flemsey.
customer_reviews.author: pppccc

customer_reviews.title: ... (to really get it right) but the table is wonderful, noiseless (that matters since we have a small ...
customer_reviews.text: i think placing the acupuncture point devices will require additional research (to really get it right) but the table is wonderful, noiseless (that matters since we have a small house and small children).
customer_reviews.author: wblake

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a inversion table, this one is Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at all the different tables out there and this one was a little bit more than the others but well worth it. You can tell all the parts were made for durability and didn't feel cheep at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and fast delivery. Ankle supports are comfortable. With stretching out hamstrings and the table in tandem you will notice a big difference in how you feel. I had been having back spasm, and in a lot of pain. Seems to be really helping .
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: This Inversion Table is wonderful for my husband
customer_reviews.text: This Inversion Table is wonderful for my husband. I believe you have to have a herniated disc for it to really show how much it helps. He goes on it three times a day or so and just for 5-7min. He swears it makes his back back in line and feels so much better. He would highly recommend it! cw
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Even recommended buy my doc
customer_reviews.text: Helps! Even recommended buy my doc...5 minutes a day does me good.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kolo

customer_reviews.title: Go slow at first...
customer_reviews.text: Love the Teeter Hangup. Only been using it a couple of days but I can tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wojack

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: First day it took care of my sciatica pain. Unbelievable. It was the easiest assembly of anything I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the original and was not disappointed. Well built and works great. Neck no longer pops and the sore spot in my back is just about gone so it does something.
customer_reviews.author: Rail Bum

product_meta.title: Teeter EP-560 Ltd. Inversion Table, Back Pain Relief Kit, FDA-Registered
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  User Manual [PDF 1.40mb] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :84 x 86 x 28.8 inches; 65 Pounds
 * Item model number :EP - 560
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :May 18, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Hang Ups
 * ASIN :B0084FD94C

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #13,110 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #13 inStrength Training Inversion Equipment 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars1,989 ratings
feature_bullets: FDA REGISTERED 510(k) DEVICE: Teeter is the ONLY FDA registered inversion table. Indicated for back pain, muscle tension, herniated disc, sciatica, muscle spasm
OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 84" L x 29" W x 86" H | Folded: 20" x 28.8" x 66" | Weight: 59.0 lbs.
CAPACITY: Height capacity: 4'8" - 6'6" | Weight capacity: 300 lbs.
QUICK ASSEMBLY: Easy 5-step, 13-minute assembly - tools included
PREMIUM FEATURES: Acupressure Nodes (8) in varied heights for trigger-point release and focused relief. Lumbar Bridge with adjustable arch for added traction and support
PRECISION ROTATION FOR TOTAL CONTROL: Shift your body weight with just simple arm movements for easy return to the upright position
HIGH GRADE MATERIALS FOR RELIABILITY: Heavy-gauge steel parts with patented security features like auto-locking hinges, cam locks, specialized pivot bearings for durability
UNMATCHED COMFORT & SUPPORT: Patented wrap-around ankle cups are made from specialty foam. Contoured Bed with Hand Grips flexes for comfort and optimizes stretch for maximum relief
